title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1124/86 of 18 April 1986 fixing for the 1986 marketing year the reference prices for cherries
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1124/86
of 18 April 1986
fixing for the 1986 marketing year the reference prices for cherries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1986 marketing year, the reference prices for cherries falling within subheading 08.07 C of the Common Customs Tariff, expressed in ECU per 100 kilograms net, of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
May (21 to 31): 137,61
June: 122,95
July: 112,22
August (1 to 10): 86,67

This Regulation shall enter into force on 21 May 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 April 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
